thread.section_title: Paris Marriott Opera Ambassador Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Everything was great!
thread.title_full: Everything was great! - Review of Paris Marriott Opera Ambassador Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Shervin S
title: Everything was great!
text: The service is excellent. When I arrived my room was not ready, so they took me to the lobby bar where I was served beverages and chocolate for free until my room was ready :) The rooms are of good size and very clean. The free WiFi is very fast and reliable. Breakfast is excellent. No complaints, really.
